//Copyrights of the Code reserved with chetan_shukla

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int primegen(int n)
{
    int i,ans=0;
    for(i=2;i<=sqrt(n);++i)
    {
        if(n%i==0)
        {
            ans=i;
            
            while(n%i==0)
            				n/=i;
        }
    }
    if (n!=1)
        	return n;
    return ans;
}
 
int main()
{
    int t,k,m,temp,i,pos=0;
   
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,ans=0;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        
 		ans=primegen(n);
 
        printf("%d\n",n/ans);
 
    }
    
    return 0;
}
